backend/main.mo: Defines a public ExplanationAnalysis type with misconception and whyFailed text fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend file to a reliability requirement for backend vs fallback analysis behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short predefined summaries for various frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling text input, validation, example insertion, submission, and rendering analysis results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook attempting backend analysis first and falling back to mock analysis with disclosure when necessary.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining warm neutral color variables, dark mode, and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/analysisPrompt.ts: Exports the single authoritative prompt string used for misconception analysis logic.
frontend/src/lib/mockAnalysis.ts: Provides a deterministic mock analysis function that returns predefined misconception explanations based on input patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, issues, and current app analysis requirements.
